sense.gloss: to become thin, to lose weight, to reduce (one's) weight, to slim
to be barren, to be infertile, to be sterile
skinny person, scrawny person, scarecrow, bag of bones
to become emaciated, to waste away, to grow thin and worn out
enduring something out of pride, putting up with it, grinning and bearing it

sdata.j: ↑痩↑↓や↓せる↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がないというのは↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だ。
sdata.e: It's too bad that I don't need to lose weight.

sdata.j: その↑痩↑↓や↓せた↑男↑↓おとこ↓は↑膝↑↓ひざ↓を↑曲↑↓ま↓げて↑日陰↑↓ひかげ↓で↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑休↑↓やす↓んだ。
sdata.e: The thin man paused in the shade with his knees a little bent.

sdata.j: その↑痩↑↓や↓せた↑男↑↓おとこ↓は↑神社↑↓じんじゃ↓の↑影↑↓かげ↓で↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑休↑↓やす↓んだ。
sdata.e: The thin man took a rest in the shade of a shrine.

sdata.j: ↑若↑↓わか↓い↑頃↑↓ころ↓は↑痩↑↓や↓せてたんだよ。
sdata.e: I used to be thin when I was young.

sdata.j: ↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓や↑寝不足↑↓ねぶそく↓で↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑最近↑↓さいきん↓１０ポンド↑近↑↓ちか↓くも↑痩↑↓や↓せてしまった。
sdata.e: Recently what with anxiety and lack of sleep, she has lost almost ten pounds.

sdata.j: ↑痩↑↓や↓せたいなら↑間食↑↓かんしょく↓は↑控↑↓ひか↓えるべきだ。
sdata.e: If you want to become thin, you should cut back on the between-meal snacks.

sdata.j: ↑痩↑↓や↓せるためには、↑何↑↓なに↓かスポーツをしたほうがよい。
sdata.e: In order to lose weight you had better take up some sport.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はオオカミのように↑痩↑↓や↓せている。
sdata.e: He is as lean as a wolf.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑夫↑↓おっと↓はハンサムな↑人↑↓ひと↓で、やや↑痩↑↓や↓せている。
sdata.e: Her husband is a nice-looking man who is a little on the lean side.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はがりがりに↑痩↑↓や↓せている。
sdata.e: She is all skin and bone.

words.gloss: to become thin, to lose weight, to reduce (one's) weight, to slim
